text: Jeff Golub (April 15, 1955 - January 1, 2015) was an American jazz guitarist. He released fifteen albums between 1988 and 2013. He also worked with Rod Stewart and Billy Squier. Golub was born in Copley, Ohio and raised in Akron. In June 2011, he became blind from optic nerve issues. In September 2012, he fell onto a train track in New York but was treated for his injuries. Golub died from progressive supranuclear palsy on January 1, 2015, aged 59. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from progressive supranuclear palsy Category:American guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:Disease-related deaths in the United States Category:Musicians from Akron, Ohio
title: Jeff Golub
